Module count
Package count.gui.kit

Class DrawString

java.lang.Object
count.gui.kit.DrawString
public class DrawString
extends Object
Static utility methods for displaying and aligning text in different manners.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös csurosm@gmail.com

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private DrawString()
    No instantiation.

  • Method Details

    • drawLeft

      public static void drawLeft​(Graphics g, String text, int x, int y)

    • drawRight

      public static void drawRight​(Graphics g, String text, int x, int y)

    • drawCentered

      public static void drawCentered​(Graphics g, String text, int x, int y)
      Draws a centered String at a given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      text - the String to be drawn
      x - X coordinate for the center of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline

    • drawAligned

      public static void drawAligned​(Graphics g, String text, int x, int y, float anchor_point)

    • drawRotatedString

      public static void drawRotatedString​(Graphics2D g, String text, int x, int y, double theta, float anchor_point)
      Draws a rotated String at a given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      text - the String to be drawn
      theta - angle for the drawing (in radians, clockwise, 0 is horizontal in g)
      x - X coordinate for the anchor point of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline at the anchor point
      anchor_point - relative position of the anchor point with respect to (x,y), given as a fraction of the width (so 1.0f means right-aligned and 0.5f is centered)

    • drawRotatedStringLeft

      public static void drawRotatedStringLeft​(Graphics2D g, String text, int x, int y, double theta)
      Draws a rotated String at a coordinate specifying the lower left corner.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      text - the String to be drawn
      theta - angle for the drawing (in radians, clockwise, 0 is horizontal in g)
      x - X coordinate for the left-hand side of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline on the left-hand side

    • drawRotatedStringRight

      public static void drawRotatedStringRight​(Graphics2D g, String text, int x, int y, double theta)
      Draws a rotated String at a coordinate specifying the lower right corner.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      text - the String to be drawn
      theta - angle for the drawing (in radians, counterclockwise, 0 is horizontal in g)
      x - X coordinate for the right side of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline on the right-hand side

    • drawRotatedStringCenter

      public static void drawRotatedStringCenter​(Graphics2D g, String text, int x, int y, double theta)
      Draws a rotated String at a coordinate specifying the center bottom.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      text - the String to be drawn
      theta - angle for the drawing (in radians, clockwise, 0 is horizontal in g)
      x - X coordinate for the center of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline at the center

    • getBoundingBoxForRotatedString

      public static Rectangle2D getBoundingBoxForRotatedString​(Graphics2D g, String text, int x, int y, double theta, float anchor_point)
      Computes the bounding box a rotated String at a given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      text - the String to be drawn
      theta - angle for the drawing (in radians, clockwise, 0 is horizontal in g)
      x - X coordinate for the anchor point of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline at the anchor point
      anchor_point - relative position of the anchor point with respect to (x,y), given as a fraction of the width (so 1.0f means right-aligned and 0.5f is centered)
      Returns:
      bounding box (in g's coordinates) for the rotated string

    • getBoundingBoxForRotatedString

      public static Rectangle2D getBoundingBoxForRotatedString​(Graphics2D g, FontMetrics fm, String text, int x, int y, double theta, float anchor_point)
      Computes the bounding box a rotated String at a given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context for drawing
      fm - FontMetrics for the string
      text - the String to be drawn
      theta - angle for the drawing (in radians, clockwise, 0 is horizontal in g)
      x - X coordinate for the anchor point of the drawn string
      y - Y coordinate for the baseline at the anchor point
      anchor_point - relative position of the anchor point with respect to (x,y), given as a fraction of the width (so 1.0f means right-aligned and 0.5f is centered)
      Returns:
      bounding box (in g's coordinates) for the rotated string
